summary: Allows you to create characters and followers with much longer fangs.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=5]As the world knows I'm working on a Tsaesci Race and the fangs just didn't look right for a human snake. So after learning a few new things I decided to create my own. NOW these fit my female snake lady's. They will work for any human race not Khajiit or Orcs (Duh). But since Argonians have human teeth essentially this will work for them too. This is more or less mainly for people who like to create followers such as vampires and want longer fangs. Players can do this for their own characters however since Skyrim player characters don't talk (wtf) it is only really for maybe screens or whatever. Also these are for female characters only![/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=#00ffff][size=5]Easy Guide:

Once in RaceMenu go to Sculpt.

Then Inport and select the Longerfangs nif.

Once there untick all the selections (T) on keyboard except for the MOUTH and click OK.

Check in Expressions tab in RaceMenu.

Note: Depending on jaw size of your creation this may or may not work with teeth sticking out or other noticeable things.   Some things can be fixed with some tweaking. 

P.S. Coming soon if I have time a new snake vampire GLOWING eye set. Stay tuned!

Armor in screen: Lustmord Armor here on the Nexus.[/size][/color][/center]
author: Kittyness
